### Resource Request
- **Resource Type**: (e.g., Compute Engine VM)
- **Name**: (e.g., my-vm-001)
- **Machine Type**: (e.g., e2-medium)
- **Region**: (e.g., us-central1)
- **Additional Config**: (e.g., 50GB disk)
